alert.note: Alert for Sherman; Valley (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 11:16PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Valley and Sherman Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1116 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Comstock to 7 miles north of Mason City to near Ansley. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Arcadia, Loup City, Litchfield and Sherman Reservoir Dam. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
